üöó 2018 Chevrolet Camaro

PEPS Key Programming - Technical Guide for Professional Locksmiths

Global A Architecture Aftermarket Friendly 10-Min Security Wait

üö® CRITICAL: Before You Start

  • Programming Slot Location: REAR cup holder - NOT front!
  • Fobs are 433 MHz ONLY - 315 MHz will NOT work
  • FCC ID must be HYQ4EA - no exceptions
  • Used keys require unlocking before reprogramming

‚ö†Ô∏è Note: 5-button fobs on convertibles will NOT control the top. 6-button fobs on coupes will have an inactive top button.

üîß Method A: Add Key (Onboard - Need 2 Working Keys)

No tokens needed. Works when customer has 2 existing keys and wants a spare.

  1. Place both working keys in the REAR cup holder
  2. Insert emergency blade into driver door lock. Turn to Unlock 5√ó in 10 seconds
  3. Dashboard shows: "Ready for Remote #3"
  4. Remove working keys. Place new key in rear cup holder
  5. Press ENGINE START button once. Wait for confirmation
  6. Hold START button 12 seconds to save and exit

üîß Method B: All Keys Lost (Diagnostic Tool)

Requires Autel IM608, Smart Pro, or Lonsdor K518. System will erase all previous keys.

  1. Connect diagnostic tool to OBD-II. Ensure battery >12.5V (use external supply)
  2. Navigate: GM ‚Üí Chevrolet ‚Üí Camaro ‚Üí 2018 ‚Üí Smart Key
  3. Select "Read Password" - tool retrieves 4-digit PIN from BCM
  4. Wait 10-12 minutes for security timer (this is normal!)
  5. Place new key in REAR cup holder. Press START button
  6. Repeat for additional keys, removing previous key first
  7. Hold START button 12 seconds to finalize
‚ö†Ô∏è Security Timer: Dashboard may go dark. Progress bar may sit at 0% for 10 minutes. This is anti-theft protection - do NOT disconnect!

üõ†Ô∏è Compatible Tools

Autel IM608

Full support. Read PIN, AKL, Add Key. No token for Global A.

Smart Pro

ADS2279 (GM 2018) + ADS2282 (PIN). Uses 1 token per session.

Lonsdor K518

Full support. K518 Pro or ISE versions with GM software.

VVDI Key Tool

Generate keys under ID46 433MHz. Ensure "Proximity" is selected.

üîç Troubleshooting

Problem Cause Solution
"No Remote Detected" Key in wrong slot / dead battery / RF interference Move key to REAR cup holder. Replace CR2032. Unplug USB chargers
PIN Read Fails (Error 11 23) BCM hung from previous session Disconnect battery 2 minutes. Retry
Tool Can't Connect BCM in deep sleep Turn hazards ON, flash high beams, press brake, open/close door
Key Won't Program Used key still locked to previous vehicle Unlock key with VVDI/Renewal adapter before programming
Programming Success but No Start Didn't hold START 12 seconds Repeat procedure and finalize properly

üìä Global A vs Global B

The 2018 Camaro uses Global A - the last year before the locked Global B architecture.

Feature Global A (2018) Global B (2019+)
Aftermarket Tools ‚úÖ Full Support ‚ö†Ô∏è Limited/CAN-FD Required
Online Auth Not Required Required
Dealer Tool Optional Often Required
